name: Planet Smashers (linkwin)
description:
Collect all the energy orbs to power your only means of escape!

  • WASD to move
  • E to pick up power orbs
  • E to use collected orbs to power escape pad
  • space to jump
  • left shift to run
  • escape to exit

Hi there! I had a blast working on this over the weekend, I hope you take the time to play and tell me what you think. It was a wild ride, and I definitely didn't finish, the game is pretty rough, a number of bugs, minimal feedback indicators, glaring lack of audio (sorry) and no balance. But I think its kinda fun nonetheless and I may fix some of the bugs and polish it up a bit over the next couple weeks.

note: v0.3 was uploaded a few minutes after deadline, with a few bug fixes.

Tools used:

Unreal Engine 5.1
